name: Paulrus and The Lost Waters (Demo)
description:
Paulrus and The Lost Waters is a game that aims to bring back some nostalgia that many of us felt growing up when we played our favourite platformer games. Join Paulrus and experience this wonderful adventure that will just keep you smiling.

Hi There! Welcome to the Walrus Kingdom! This is the "Paulrus and The Lost Waters" Demo. It's a game that is heavily inspired by 90s platformer classics such as Banjo Kazooie, Spyro the Dragon and Super Mario 64. In this game you play as a young Walrus, who is tasked to bring back stolen water from different worlds. Levels are affected by the water, and can change once the water is taken out. - "You get to experience, then re-experience these worlds for a full and engaging experience!"

The Emerald Jungle

In this demo you will explore a lost jungle, known for it's treasure and secrecy. Paulrus can choose to extract the water, opening up the level for more to find. There are a total of 82 clams to find, and 7 gemstones to earn. Can you get them all?

Disclaimer - This is just a demo of one of the levels. It is a working progress, and is subject to change. Due to the demo jumping straight into a specific section, please refer to the "controls" in game to know how to play.

Key Experiences;

  • Simple, but fun and tight controls.
  • An adorable character, that is full of life.
  • Nostalgia on steroids'!
  • Lots of things to collect!
  • No hand holding here folks!
